abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman sues Rensselaer County district attorney's office over its handling of fatal shooting of unarmed black man Edson Thevenin in April by Troy police officer, Sgt Randy French, during traffic stop.
lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman says the Rensselaer County district attorney violated an executive order giving the attorney general powers to investigate and prosecute fatal police shootings of unarmed civilians.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Sues Over Police Shooting Case in Troy
headline.print_headline: Attorney General Sues Over Troy Police Shooting Case

snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman says the Rensselaer County district attorney violated an executive order giving the attorney general powers to investigate and prosecute fatal police shootings of unarmed civilians.
